mapper.select: SELECT a.room_no , a.room_name , a.mem_id , b.mem_nm , a.reg_date , a.del_yn FROM rooms a , member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT a.room_no , a.room_name , a.mem_id , b.mem_nm , a.reg_date , a.del_yn FROM rooms a , member b WHERE a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.room_no = #{roomNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rooms (room_no, room_name, mem_id, reg_date, del_yn) VALUES (room_seq.NEXTVAL, #{roomName}, #{memId}, SYSDATE, 'N')
